titles.title: Encouraging Veteran Employment Act of 2018

To amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Defense, in awarding a contract for the procurement of goods or services, to give a preference to offerors that employ veterans, and for other purposes.
Encouraging Veteran Employment Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Encouraging Veteran Employment Act of 2018
This bill authorizes the Department of Defense (DOD) to give preferential selection for DOD contracts to businesses that employ veterans based on the percentage of full-time employees who are veterans.
A business that intentionally misrepresents the veteran status of its employees in a bid may be suspended or debarred from contract competition for at least five years.
